About.paragraph: Makrant Bhanot and Vikrant Boora are co-foundeders of design startup company Proxecto. The idea got its root  from several freelance work done togather as a team. The duo realised that they worked and thought about it everyday. Obviously they were passionate about it. So the companies mantra is ' just put your mind to it and do it.' As for competition we embrace them, learn from them. The contemporary education one of our directors is a software engineer and another is an aerospace engineer but what's life if it goes as planned... So here we take a leap of faith with a zeal to do our best.

Services.name: Graphic Design
Services.text: Logo Design, Digital Designs, Editorial Designs, Exibition Designs, Packaging Designs, Illustrations, Banner Designs, Brochure, Leaflet and Corporate Identities.

Services.name: Film Editing and Visual Effects
Services.text: Advertisments, Documentaries, Visual Effects, Motion Graphics, Animation and Film/Video Editing

Services.name: Web Design
Services.text: 3D and Animated Website Designing, UI/UX Design, Dynamic and Static Web Design, Landing Page Design, Website Front-End Back-End Development, Search Engine Optimization and Digital Marketing
